DeathSteel::

He went to thrust downward when his leg was hit. He went down on his 
back. "ARG!" He was starting to feel the effects of mech fluid loss 
from the gash in his thigh that Kaiser had given him earlier. He 
brought his battle blade up to protect himself from the next blow 
about to be delt. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He mumbles to himself as his thrusts are blocked and blocks 
the upward 
> slash with his blades crossed above his opponent's.  He then spins 
himself 
> over his opponent's blade and drops to a crouch.  He lashes out 
with his 
> nearest leg in a sweep to knock the legs out from under DeathSteel.
